DOC.brief_summary: Patients with a higher breast cancer risk (higher than 17% according to the IBIS calculation) will receive a 2D digital mammography together with a 3D tomosynthesis (so called combo tomo) of both breasts in two views in order to investigate the additional value of tomosynthesis in the diagnosis of breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Digital 3D Breast Tomosynthesis Versus 2D in Clinical Evaluation of High Risk Women
DOC.criteria: women more than 17% risk for breast cancer (IBIS calculation) > 40y old < 40y old
